name: quarter
description: Determines the quarter a datetime column falls into (1, 2, 3, 4)

name: percent_change
description: Determines the percent difference between values in a list.

name: distance_to_holiday
description: Computes the number of days before or after a given holiday.

name: and
description: Performs element-wise logical AND of two lists.

name: less_than
description: Determines if values in one list are less than another list.

name: rolling_max
description: Determines the maximum of entries over a given window.

name: total_word_length
description: Determines the total word length.

name: same_as_previous
description: Determines if a value is equal to the previous value in a list.

name: equal_scalar
description: Determines if values in a list are equal to a given scalar.

name: expanding_trend
description: Computes the expanding trend for events over a given window.

name: url_to_protocol
description: Determines the protocol (http or https) of a url.

name: second
description: Determines the seconds value of a datetime.

name: negate
description: Negates a numeric value.

name: not_equal
description: Determines if values in one list are not equal to another list.

name: greater_than_equal_to
description: Determines if values in one list are greater than or equal to another list.

name: is_null
description: Determines if a value is null.

name: year
description: Determines the year value of a datetime.

name: num_characters
description: Calculates the number of characters in a given string, including whitespace and punctuation.

name: hour
description: Determines the hour value of a datetime.

name: absolute_diff
description: Calculates the absolute difference from the previous element in a list of numbers.

name: cum_max
description: Calculates the cumulative maximum.

name: multiply_numeric
description: Performs element-wise multiplication of two lists.

name: rolling_mean
description: Calculates the mean of entries over a given window.

name: punctuation_count
description: Determines number of punctuation characters in a string.

name: diff_datetime
description: Computes the timedelta between a datetime in a list and the previous datetime in that list.

name: url_to_domain
description: Determines the domain of a url.

name: is_year_start
description: Determines if a date falls on the start of a year.

name: percentile
description: Determines the percentile rank for each value in a list.

name: not_equal_scalar
description: Determines if values in a list are not equal to a given scalar.

name: less_than_scalar
description: Determines if values are less than a given scalar.

name: count_string
description: Determines how many times a given string shows up in a text field.

name: is_weekend
description: Determines if a date falls on a weekend.

name: number_of_unique_words
description: Determines the number of unique words in a string.

name: is_leap_year
description: Determines the is_leap_year attribute of a datetime column.

name: divide_numeric
description: Performs element-wise division of two lists.

name: age
description: Calculates the age in years as a floating point number given a date of birth.

name: modulo_numeric_scalar
description: Computes the modulo of each element in the list by a given scalar.

name: rolling_outlier_count
description: Determines how many values are outliers over a given window.

name: haversine
description: Calculates the approximate haversine distance between two LatLong columns.

name: time_since_previous
description: Computes the time since the previous entry in a list.

name: rolling_count
description: Determines a rolling count of events over a given window.

name: lag
description: Shifts an array of values by a specified number of periods.

name: rate_of_change
description: Computes the rate of change of a value per second.

name: subtract_numeric
description: Performs element-wise subtraction of two lists.

name: cum_sum
description: Calculates the cumulative sum.

name: upper_case_word_count
description: Determines the number of words in a string that are entirely capitalized.

name: week
description: Determines the week of the year from a datetime.

name: num_unique_separators
description: Calculates the number of unique separators.

name: is_federal_holiday
description: Determines if a given datetime is a federal holiday.

name: cum_min
description: Calculates the cumulative minimum.

name: rolling_std
description: Calculates the standard deviation of entries over a given window.

name: number_of_mentions
description: Determines the number of mentions in a string.

name: is_year_end
description: Determines if a date falls on the end of a year.

name: date_to_holiday
description: Transforms time of an instance into the holiday name, if there is one.

name: url_to_tld
description: Determines the top level domain of a url.

name: geomidpoint
description: Determines the geographic center of two coordinates.

name: exponential_weighted_std

name: sine
description: Computes the sine of a number.

name: or

name: less_than_equal_to_scalar
description: Determines if values are less than or equal to a given scalar.

name: median_word_length
description: Determines the median word length.

name: part_of_day
description: Determines the part of day of a datetime.

name: num_words
description: Determines the number of words in a string. Words are sequences of characters delimited by whitespace.

name: is_lunch_time
description: Determines if a datetime falls during configurable lunch hour, on a 24-hour clock.

name: add_numeric_scalar
description: Adds a scalar to each value in the list.

name: greater_than
description: Determines if values in one list are greater than another list.

name: expanding_count
description: Computes the expanding count of events over a given window.

name: full_name_to_title

name: time_since
description: Calculates time from a value to a specified cutoff datetime.

name: latitude
description: Returns the first tuple value in a list of LatLong tuples. For use with the LatLong logical type.

name: is_working_hours
description: Determines if a datetime falls during working hours on a 24-hour clock. Can configure start_hour and end_hour.

name: natural_logarithm
description: Computes the natural logarithm of a number.

description: Determines if values are greater than or equal to a given scalar.

name: modulo_numeric
description: Performs element-wise modulo of two lists.

name: number_of_hashtags
description: Determines the number of hashtags in a string.

name: divide_numeric_scalar
description: Divides each element in the list by a scalar.

name: one_digit_postal_code

name: minute

name: date_to_time_zone

name: expanding_min

name: cumulative_time_since_last_false

name: longitude

name: upper_case_count
description: Calculates the number of upper case letters in text.

name: is_month_start
description: Determines the is_month_start attribute of a datetime column.

name: divide_by_feature

description: Computes the expanding maximum of events over a given window.

name: title_word_count

description: Determines if values are greater than a given scalar.

description: Performs element-wise addition of two lists.

name: cum_mean
description: Calculates the cumulative mean.

name: two_digit_postal_code

description: Determines if values in one list are equal to another list.

description: Computes the expanding mean of events over a given window.
